# Function: runOnBackground()

```ts
function runOnBackground<Fn>(f: Fn): (...args: Parameters<Fn>) => void
```

`runOnBackground` allows triggering js functions on the js context asynchronously.

| `Fn` *extends* (...`args`: `any`[]) => `any` |

| ------ | ------ | ------ |
